title: Prince William Forest Park: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics       Designations Prince William Forest Park - June 22, 1948 Chopawamsic Recreational Demonstration Area - November 14, 1936  Â    Visitation Statistics Anyone can view the visitation statistics at Prince William Forest Park and at any other unit of the National Park Service.  Visit the National Park Service Public Use Statistics webpage for more information.
